titleStmt.title: The faith and testimony of the martyrs and suffering servants of Jesus Christ persecuted in New England vindicated against the lyes and slanders cast on them by Nathaniel Morton in his book intituled New England memorial / written ... by ... Christopher Holder.
titleStmt.author: Holder, Christopher, d. 1688.
Rous, John, d. 1695. A few queries put forth.

notesStmt.note: "A few queries put forth" by John Rous, p. 10-11.
Imprint suggested by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
